metadata.dc:author: Mata Maderuelo, F
Marín Fidalgo, R
Jiménez Morales, J
Delgado Moreno, F
metadata.dc:description: In the differential diagnosis of the bronchial aspiration syndrome of foreign bodies, we must place the congenital malformations among the rare causes that can simulated it. In this work, we present a case in which bronchoscopy was indicated because the existence of intrabronchial foreign body was suspected.
metadata.dc:title: Malformación adenomatoidea quística congénita pulmonar.
[Congenital cystic adenomatoid malformation of lung].
